title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 246.13 - Additional requirements to provide heat input data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 246.13 - Additional requirements to provide heat input data

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a MRP unit that monitors and
reports Hg mass emissions using a mercury concentration monitoring system and a
flow monitoring system shall also monitor and report the heat input rate at the
unit level using the procedures set forth in 40 CFR part
75. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
246.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
